name: Phoenix Anarchy was started
description: Phoenix anarchy (PA) was started by Dumbledore, to house the players from the recently shut down Nether Anarchy (NA). The server started on minecraft version 1.17.

name: The server reaches 60 people
description: Servers player slots are filled up on the first day.

name: The first wither spawned
description: Spawned by: Rareist

name: The first spawn trench was started
description: Made by: Alekath

name: The first nether hub was created
The server started to accept donations
The world border was reached
description: TacticalSpoon was the first to reach the world border and the world border corner.

name: Apalo typed the entire Bee Movie script
The Fraternity made the first spawn logo
description: The Fraternity made their logo, a teacup at spawn. It took an hour to build and used 117k obsidian.

name: The Fraternity withers spawn
description: In the event called "The WIthering" the Fraternity placed over 1000 withers at spawn.

name: YouHuntHard bombs spawn
description: Hunt used TNT dupers to destory a 125 x 4000 block area of spawn.

name: The clearing of nether spawn was started
description: The players PhD, EMOYEET, gappleupvegan, francyfranky, YouHuntHard, and Number81. Mined out bombed nether spawn.

name: The server laged so much it hit 2 players
The first voting reward given to CCD
description: Dumbledore gave a feather to CatCalledDog as a reward for voting.

name: The first spawn wall was completed
description: The Fraternity created a spawn wall out of lava casts.

name: Gnir Lleb and Horizon base is griefed
description: Griefed by: Venomforce

name: Nether Corp main base is griefed
description: Griefed by:  King_Pin, GoodNightTea, and can

name: End spawn clearing was started
description: Number81, ByLu, and YouHuntHard started blowing up the main end island.

name: The dragon egg was stolen
description: While Lotion was being given the dragon egg achievement by Tyrannus, he logged off and did not return the egg.

name: The PA dev server is launched
description: IP: dev.phoenixanarchy.com

name: The base Montsombre was started
description: Montsombre was a Fraternity spawn base.

name: Minecraft 1.18 released
description: The server did not update.

name: CatCalledDog reached 100 subscribers
description: CCD a PA youtuber reached 100 subscribers.

name: Moderators were added to PA discord
The nether world border was reached
description: CatCalledDog was the first to reach the nether world border.

name: A 4k Spawwn render made by Creeper0
Login invincibility removed
description: Players will no longer be invincible when logging in next to another player.

name: Phoenix Anarcy updated to 1.18.1
description: Dumbledore posted in the PA timeline when the PA updated.

name: First 1.18 advancment
description: Made by: Mitch023

name: The Fraternity made a new spawn logo
description: The Fraternity constructed a new spawn logo with a teapot and text saying "time for tea".

name: Dawnstar was griefed
description: The Fraternity base Dawnstar was griefed by. Darkkk, TheCierDier, SpicyRedPotato, ResperyMartin, 6chem, EDC, Gbns, SH1TEATIN_GOBLIN, nonsenese, and Otter.

name: Subterrania was griefed
description: The Fraternity base Subterrania was griefed by. Darkkk, TheCierDier, SpicyRedPotato, ResperyMartin, 6chem, EDC, Gbns, SH1TEATIN_GOBLIN, nonsenese, and Otter.

name: Goblin city was griefed
description: grifed by: Radial and Melsidious

name: New spawn render was created
description: Created by: Sarduras

name: Another spawn render was created
description: Created by: thebest9178

name: IcatIcatI takes a break from PA
description: IcatIcatI, the oldest member in the community leaves the server.

name: The server uses Nether Anarchy map
The server goes back to normal map
Alpha Outpost was griefed
description: The Fraternity base, Alpha Outpost was the first base on the server.

name: Cat spawn base was rebuilt
description: Cat spawn base was rebuilt for the 4th time by IcatIcatI

name: Sleepylessons spoted
description: Sleepylessons joined the PA discord

name: Glitch found by IcatIcatI
description: While traveling in the nether bedrock would be broken around the player in new chunks.

name: Fraternity has an anniversary party
description: The Fraternity sets up a public event to celebrate the servers 1 year anniversary!

name: Dumbledore summoned a warden
description: Dumbledore used commands to summon a warden at the anniversary party!

name: Donfuer base griefed
description: Grifed by: Kn0t_mc and 86ac

name: The valley of carrots was griefed
description: Built by: sjokoboll, traviss_scottt, and mqqngo

name: The PA Timeline website was created
description: Created by: cqb13
